synopsis.text:
The high school soccer scene is about to be transformed by two unlikely friends: the ordinary yet passionate Tsukushi Tsukamoto and the prodigious but solitary Jin Kazama. Tsukushi, despite lacking any exceptional talents, possesses an unyielding spirit and a relentless determination to never abandon his team, even in the face of injury. Jin, on the other hand, is a natural soccer genius who can't help but be drawn to Tsukushi's unwavering dedication.

On a stormy night, their paths cross, and they are thrust into the thrilling world of competitive soccer. Under the rigorous mentorship of their captain, Hisahito Mizuki, they strive to propel their team to new heights. This heartwarming and intense narrative unfolds as these two contrasting characters unite, igniting a spark that will change the course of their high school soccer journey forever.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
